title: Christmas fruit compote
ingredients: ['450g mixed dried fruit', '100g sliced orange (including the skin)', '50g sliced lemon (including the skin)', '2 bananas, thinly sliced', '1 red apple, unpeeled, finely chopped', '1 pear, finely chopped', '1 small tin crushed pineapple', '750ml orange juice (or enough to cover)', '250ml port', 'dark brown soft sugar to taste (optional)', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon (or one cinnamon stick)', 'Cream and/or ice cream to serve']
